attributes.action: improve the record - keeping and make orthopeadic checks more systematic
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Despite increases in deep vein thrombosis and trauma, from the military, road traffic and orthopaedic surgery, junior staff are being told "not to bother" with checking foot pulses - please add this routine check to printed TPR checks to improve outcomes in vascular surgery. The petitioner would like to call for the PM to address different practices between district and regional centres.
Please add a simple tick box to printed TPR charts that includes colour,
sensation and movement (C - S - M) as well as all four foot pulses (eg dorsalis pedal etc).

rejection.details: Please contact the Department of Health directly.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
